specs.title: should change output type and generate
should change tone and generate different output
should show error for empty input
should show loading state during generation
should save prompt to history after generation
should persist history across page reloads
should show empty state when no history
REGRESSION: identical output for same inputs

error.message:
Error: [2mexpect([22m[31mreceived[39m[2m).[22mtoContain[2m([22m[32mexpected[39m[2m) // indexOf[22m

Expected substring: [32m"PROMPT"[39m
Received string:    [31m"**LANDING PAGE COPY BLUEPRINT**·[39m
[31m**HERO SECTION**[39m
[31m- **Headline**: \"AI-Powered Marketing That Grows Your Small Business\"[39m
[31m- **Subheadline**: \"Stop wasting time on tedious marketing tasks. Our AI automates your campaigns, optimizes your content, and drives real results—all on autopilot.\"[39m
[31m- **CTA Primary**: \"Start Free Trial\" (14-day trial, no credit card required)[39m
[31m- **Visual Direction**: A clean, modern dashboard showcasing AI-driven insights and automated workflows.·[39m
[31m**PROBLEM SECTION** (75 words)[39m
[31m- **Hook**: \"Running a small business is hard enough. Marketing shouldn't feel like a full-time job.\"[39m
[31m- **Pain Points**:[39m
[31m  - Spending hours creating social media posts that get little engagement.[39m
[31m  - Difficulty tracking campaign performance and ROI.[39m
[31m  - Lack of time to personalize marketing messages for each customer.[39m
[31m- **Cost of Inaction**: \"Without effective marketing, you're losing customers to competitors who are easier to find and more engaging.\"·[39m
[31m**SOLUTION SECTION** (3-5 bullet points)[39m
[31m- **Feature → Benefit Format, Quantifiable Results**:[39m
[31m  - \"AI-Powered Content Creation → Generate high-converting blog posts, social media updates, and email newsletters in minutes, saving you 5+ hours per week.\"[39m
[31m  - \"Automated Campaign Optimization → Our AI continuously analyzes your campaigns and adjusts bidding, targeting, and messaging to maximize ROI by up to 30%.\"[39m
[31m  - \"Personalized Customer Journeys → Deliver tailored marketing experiences to each customer based on their behavior, leading to a 2x increase in engagement and conversions.\"·[39m
[31m**SOCIAL PROOF**[39m
[31m- **Testimonial Template with Attribution**: \"[Quote about ease of use and significant ROI improvement]\" - John Smith, Owner of Smith's Bakery[39m
[31m- **Stats**: \"Trusted by 500+ Small Businesses to Grow Their Revenue\"[39m
[31m- **Trust Badges**: \"GDPR Compliant\", \"SOC 2 Certified\", \"4.8/5 Stars on Capterra\"·[39m
[31m**HOW IT WORKS** (3-4 numbered steps)[39m
[31m- **Simple Process, Remove Mental Friction**:[39m
[31m  1. \"Connect Your Accounts: Seamlessly integrate your existing marketing platforms with our AI.\"[39m
[31m  2. \"Set Your Goals: Define your target audience, budget, and desired outcomes.\"[39m
[31m  3. \"Activate the AI: Let our AI automate your campaigns and optimize your results.\"·[39m
[31m**FAQ SECTION** (3-5 questions)[39m
[31m- **Address Top Objections, Reduce Purchase Anxiety**:[39m
[31m  - \"Is it easy to set up and use?\"[39m
[31m  - \"What kind of results can I expect?\"[39m
[31m  - \"How is my data protected?\"·[39m
[31m**FINAL CTA**[39m
[31m- **Restate Value + Urgency + Risk Reversal (Guarantee/Trial)**:[39m
[31m  - **Headline**: \"Unlock the Power of AI for Your Small Business Today\"[39m
[31m  - **Subtext**: \"Start your 14-day free trial and see how our AI can transform your marketing efforts. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.\"[39m
[31m  - **Button**: \"Get Started Free →\""[39m
